properties.areaDesc: Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Eastern Glacier
properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 3 at 2:24AM MST until February 5 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph, with gusts around 60 mph
possible.

* WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front and Eastern Glacier.

* WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through late Tuesday night.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could cause tree or power line damage.
Travel may become difficult, especially for high profile
vehicles.
properties.instruction:
Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this
situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe
location prior to the onset of winds.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT
